text: @cspan @PressSec Trump can’t do anything about the Covid-19 crisis because (1) it doesn’t respond to threats, and (2) it can’t be bribed to go away. And those are the only tools this tool has in his toolbox. #VoteOutTheGOP #VoteOutTraitorTrump
